lines.text: Alright, who's gonna share the bed with me? Huh? You gotta make a decision. I've spend the last three years in prison so... don't make a difference to me. I prefer a woman but a man will do it, we fix.
It's a little joke. You two stay on the floor. And if it's any comfort to you, Henry, you're not my type.
Divorce papers. When you sign it, we'll no longer be married. You're entitled to nothing. No settlement, no alimony. Not a penny.
So you don't spend the rest of your life in prison.
Give her a bus fare. Anywhere she wants to go.
